<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<descriptor id="FLUENT" filled="true"><options name="base.parameter" info="基本参数" id="basic" narrow="false"><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="true" label="作业名称" id="JOB_NAME" helpText="" follower="null" width="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="true" label="核数" id="NCPU" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="1" selected="false">1</option><option id="2" selected="false">2</option><option id="4" selected="true">4</option><option id="6" selected="false">6</option><option id="8" selected="false">8</option><option id="10" selected="false">10</option><option id="12" selected="false">12</option><option id="16" selected="false">16</option><option id="16" selected="false">32</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="队列" id="QUEUE" helpText="" follower="" defaultValue="undefined" hidden="false"><option id="fluent" selected="true">fluent</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="是否支持图形界面" id="CONSOLE_SUPPORT" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="Yes" selected="true">Yes</option><option id="No" selected="false">No</option></option></options><options name="application.parameter" info="应用参数" id="application" narrow="false"><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="内存构架" id="MEMARC" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="Sequential" selected="false">Sequential</option><option id="SMP" selected="true">SMP</option><option id="DMP" selected="false">DMP</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="MPI类型" id="MPI_TYPE" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="intel" selected="false">intel</option><option id="SMP" selected="true">hp</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="Fluent版本" id="FLUENT_VERSION" helpText="" follower="" defaultValue="undefined" hidden="false"><option id="12.1" selected="false">12.1</option><option id="13.0" selected="false">13.0</option><option id="14.5" selected="false">14.5</option><option id="17.2" selected="true">17.2</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="维度" id="VERSION" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="3d" selected="true">3d</option><option id="3ddp" selected="false">3ddp</option><option id="2d" selected="false">2d</option><option id="2ddp" selected="false">2ddp</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" label="迭代次数" id="ITE_NUM" helpText="" follower="null" width="null" defaultValue="100" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" required="false" label="Journal文件" id="FLUENT_JOURNAL" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" required="true" label=".cas输入文件" id="CAS_INPUT_FILE" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" required="false" label=".dat输入文件" id="DAT_INPUT_FILE" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option></options><options name="install.application.parameter" info="应用程序安装参数" id="mandatory" narrow="false"><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" label="Fluent命令行" id="FLUENT_CMD" helpText="FLUENT_CMD:Fluent,install,directory. For exsample:/app/ansys_inc/v121/fluent/bin/fluent" follower="null" width="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" label="Fluent许可证文件" id="LM_LICENSE_FILE" helpText="LM_LICENSE_FILE:full,path,to the FLUENT license file. 1555@chnshas1016" follower="null" width="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option></options></descriptor>
